remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以检索从属性控件，并使用它以视觉方式指示拖放操作中的预期的放置位置时某一项拖动到新位置。You can retrieve a from the property of a control and use it to visually indicate the expected drop location in a drag-and-drop operation when an item is dragged to a new position. 此功能时才起作用属性设置为`true`以及何时控件不会自动对项。This feature works only when the property is set to `true` and when the control does not sort the items automatically. 若要防止自动排序属性必须设置为和属性必须设置为， ，或。To prevent automatic sorting, the property must be set to and the property must be set to , , or . 此外，不能插入标记功能与使用分组功能，因为通过组成员身份对项进行分组功能排列。Additionally, the insertion mark feature cannot be used with the grouping feature because the grouping feature orders the items by group membership. 类通常在处理程序中使用或事件来更新插入标记的位置，如某一项拖动。The class is typically used in a handler for the or event to update the position of the insertion mark as an item is dragged. 处理程序中还使用它或事件以在正确的位置插入拖动的项。It is also used in a handler for the or event to insert a dragged item at the correct location. 若要更新插入标记的位置，请按照下列步骤：To update the position of the insertion mark, follow these steps: 1. 中的处理程序或事件，使用属性来访问与关联的对象控件。In a handler for the or event, use the property to access the object associated with the control. 2. 使用方法来检索鼠标指针距离最近的项的索引。Use the method to retrieve the index of the item closest to the mouse pointer. 3. 传递到的索引值方法来检索项的边框。Pass the index value to the method to retrieve the bounding rectangle of the item. 4. 如果鼠标指针是否位于的边界的矩形的中点左侧，设置属性`false`; 否则为将其设置为`true`。If the mouse pointer is located to the left of the midpoint of the bounding rectangle, set the property to `false`; otherwise, set it to `true`. 5. 设置属性检索到的索引值从方法。Set the property to the index value retrieved from the method. 指定的索引，请对左侧或右侧，具体取决于项的旁边，插入标记将显示属性值。The insertion mark appears next to item with the specified index, either to the left or the right, depending on the property value. 如果某项拖动到其本身，索引为-1，并且插入标记为隐藏。If an item is dragged over itself, the index is -1 and the insertion mark is hidden. 若要在正确的位置插入所拖动的项，请按照下列步骤：To insert the dragged item at the correct location, follow these steps: 1. 中的处理程序或事件，使用属性以确定插入标记的当前位置。In a handler for the or event, use the property to determine the current location of the insertion mark. 将存储此值，以更高版本用作插入索引。Store this value to be used later as the insertion index. 2. 如果属性设置为`true`，递增存储的插入索引值。If the property is set to `true`, increment the stored insertion index value. 3. 使用方法插入到所拖动的项的复本集合中存储的插入索引处。Use the method to insert a clone of the dragged item into the collection at the stored insertion index. 4. 使用方法移除所拖动的项的原始副本。Use the method to remove the original copy of the dragged item. 因此中的索引值中移除的原始副本之前，必须将插入所拖动的项的复本集合不会更改在进行插入之前。You must insert a clone of the dragged item before the original copy is removed so the index values in the collection are not altered before the insertion. 若要确保的项将显示在它们的索引值的顺序相同，必须设置属性的实现按索引值对项进行排序的接口。To ensure that the items are displayed in the same order as their index values, you must set the property to an implementation of the interface that sorts items by index value. 有关详细信息，请参阅示例部分。For more information, see the Example section. 你可以通过使用修改插入标记的颜色属性。You can modify the color of the insertion mark by using the property. 如果你需要的大小或插入标记的位置，你可以通过获取其边界的矩形属性。If you need the size or position of the insertion mark, you can get its bounding rectangle through the property. > [!NOTE] > 插入标记功能则仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上可用的当你的应用程序调用方法。The insertion mark feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. 在早期的操作系统上将忽略与插入标记相关的任何代码，并且插入标记将不会出现。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to the insertion mark will be ignored and the insertion mark will not appear. 因此，取决于插入标记功能的任何代码可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the insertion mark feature may not work correctly. 你可能想要包括的测试，确定是否可用，插入标记功能和不可用时提供备用的功能。You may want to include a test that determines whether the insertion mark feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，你可能想要绕过实现拖放项重新定位时不支持插入标记的操作系统上运行的所有代码。For example, you may want to bypass all code that implements drag-and-drop item repositioning when running on operating systems that do not support insertion marks. > > 插入标记功能由同一个库提供操作系统主题功能提供。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用方法重载并传入值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你可以找到项最接近鼠标指针，但必须执行自己的计算来确定是否应显示插入标记，此选项之前或之后。The method lets you find the item closest to the mouse pointer, but you must do your own calculations to determine whether the insertion mark should appear before or after this item. 若要计算所需的值属性，请按照下列步骤：To calculate the value needed for the property, follow these steps: 1. 使用方法来检索鼠标指针距离最近的项的索引。Use the method to retrieve the index of the item closest to the mouse pointer. 2. 传递到的索引值方法来检索项的边框。Pass the index value to the method to retrieve the bounding rectangle of the item. 3. 如果鼠标指针是否位于的边界的矩形的中点左侧，设置属性`false`; 否则为将其设置为`true`。If the mouse pointer is located to the left of the midpoint of the bounding rectangle, set the property to `false`; otherwise, set it to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅概述参考主题。For more information, see the overview reference topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用插入标记功能和实现拖放项重新排序使用标准拖动事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入标记的位置更新处理程序中事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序，鼠标指针的位置进行比较到中点的最近的项，然后使用结果来确定向左或向右的项是否显示插入标记。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果，插入标记将显示具有指定索引的项的左侧属性设置为`false`; 否则为它显示项的右侧。The insertion mark appears to the left of the item with the specified index if the property is set to `false`; otherwise, it appears to the right of the item. 插入标记将自动消失拖动的项插入到集合。The insertion mark disappears automatically when a dragged item is inserted into the collection. 若要插入标记手动删除，例如，拖动到自身或拖出控件项时，将设置值为-1。To remove the insertion mark manually, for example, when an item is dragged onto itself or dragged outside the control, set the value to -1. 使用方法来检索与指定的位置，例如鼠标指针拖放操作中定位某个项时的位置最接近的项的索引。Use the method to retrieve the index of the item closest to a specified location, such as the location of the mouse pointer when positioning an item in a drag-and-drop operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用插入标记功能和实现拖放项重新排序使用标准拖动事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入标记的位置更新处理程序中事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序，鼠标指针的位置进行比较到中点的最近的项，然后使用结果来确定向左或向右的项是否显示插入标记。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可让你执行拖放操作时找到鼠标指针距离最近的项。This method lets you locate the item closest to the mouse pointer when doing a drag-and-drop operation. 使用索引值返回设置属性。Use the index value returned to set the property. 鼠标指针距离最近的项时要拖动的项，则此方法的返回值为-1。When the item closest to the mouse pointer is the item being dragged, the return value of this method is -1. 在这种情况下，设置属性为此值将会隐藏插入标记。In this case, setting the property to this value hides the insertion mark. 此方法找到最近的项而不考虑鼠标指针的位置，同时方法返回的项位于指定位置，或`null`如果在该位置没有项。This method finds the closest item regardless of where the mouse pointer is located, while the method returns the item at the specified location only, or `null` if there is no item at that location. 方法返回`null`，例如，当鼠标指针是否位于两个项之间。The method returns `null`, for example, when the mouse pointer is located between two items. 为此，你应始终使用方法时使用拖放操作来定位项。For this reason, you should always use the method when using a drag-and-drop operation to position items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用插入标记功能和实现拖放项重新排序使用标准拖动事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 插入标记的位置更新处理程序中事件。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序，鼠标指针的位置进行比较到中点的最近的项，然后使用结果来确定向左或向右的项是否显示插入标记。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic.
